summary: The diff introduces multiple code and documentation changes (including a new backend migration and modifications to backend/main.mo), which violates the publish-only requirement to promote the existing draft artifact to production with no code/config changes and no migrations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish (promote) the currently deployed draft build as the production version, without making any code or configuration changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains new and modified source files, so the production deployment would not be using the exact same draft artifact. Additionally, a backend migration file was added, which explicitly violates the publish-only/migration prohibition.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend migration module and wired migration execution into the backend actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids introducing a migration for a publish-only action and forbids code changes; adding backend/migration.mo and importing/using it in backend/main.mo are unrequested changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new documentation file describing a publish process.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 requires no code or configuration changes; adding new documentation is still a repository change and was not requested as part of a promotion-only publish action.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-related tracked summary content (indicating numerous frontend behavior/styling hooks and diagnostics features).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request forbids modifying application features/UI/logic; the updated frontend file summary text indicates extensive app behavior/UI/styling elements, which are out of scope for publish-only promotion (even if only represented here as summary content).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project state tracking file describing a new request in pending status.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1; publish-only action should not require repository metadata changes.
